title: 12-10-2022 _ Update Short Term Bearish Idea _ AUDCHF Daily
name: ansfar
contents:
That’s an update on Short Term Bearish Idea _ AUDCHF Daily shared on 29-09-2022

1- The price action almost retraced to the Grey Support Zone as expected and then continued further lower towards 100% Fibo. Extension of the 2nd Wave.
2- In the due course of time it has also completed the Harmonic Pattern of AB=CD .
3- Since AB=CD pattern is almost complete; therefore, one can expect a pullback towards the support zone .

title: Update on HDRN retracement (see previous publication)
name: murphc09
contents:
Initially the 'Elliot wave absolute' indicator was projecting a retracement to the Fib.1 level as part of wave C.
It now looks like the retracement will go to 0.168 as wave C.
The buying pressure is resulting in a less dramatic downtrend.
Box indicates area to start accumulating and hoping for an upwards bounce.

title: BoredCoin - Still bearish
name: ShawnMCR
contents:
Hello, dear TradingView members .
This is a short-term Bitcoin idea.

Bitcoin is getting more boring day by day.
For now, the market is still bearish for Bitcoin , and we're still using our most substantial support.
Be careful with your long positions.
Don't forget to use a stop loss.

There are two resistance levels on the way up and two support levels on the way down.
Based on the market volume and the RSI indicator, The price might reach this level and then get rejected.
And as you can see on the chart, the market is still bearish , and we're still sitting on the 18K-19K support area .

The following support is around the 13K levels, which is also vital; I will discuss it once we get there.


Take a look at this chart for a better understanding of the market:


Now let's see your ideas. Let's have a discussion.

Let me know if you guys have any questions;
I will be more than happy to help.

Good luck, and thank you.

title: $TS with a Bearish outlook following its earnings #Stocks
name: EPSMomentum
contents: The PEAD projected a Bearish outlook for $TS after a Negative Under reaction following its earnings release placing the stock in drift D with an expected accuracy of 75%.

contents:

Now the price is forming the bottom.
Rapid growth is possible.✅

title: Btcusdt
name: Todopoderoso
contents: finally the day have arrived , tomorrow cpi data gets released before market open at 5:30am pacific time. I would wait after the data is real eased to open long or short position . It’s going to be very straightforward markets are waiting for this stupid inflation to stop rising before going long. So at this point it could go either way . Just go with the flow if bulls take over tomorrow open longs . good luck

title: Dxy idea
name: Todopoderoso
contents: Lol this disgrace refuses to break upper channel resistance. With tomorrow cpi I expect this scam to go down and stock market to go up in inflation falls. worst case scenario inflation increases and with it the chance to get another .75 rate hike pushing the dollar past this and reaching 120. So keep an eye on tomorrows cpi data in the morning before market opens.

title: ✅TS ❕ GBPJPY: resistance level✅
name: TradingStat
contents:
✅GBPJPY has reached the resistance level .
The price has already rebounded from this level several times.
I'm expecting a fall.✅

🚀SELL scenario: short to 157.9.🚀

----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Remember, there is no place for luck in trading - only strategy!
Thanks for the likes and comments.

title: Bitcoin – $17300 in October!
name: SkyrexTrading
contents:
Hello, everyone!

I found another one super realistic scenario which confirms that the bottom could be this month. Locally I did couple mistakes according to trading chaos approach on the 1h timeframe. I will continue study trading chaos, but today let’s use the classical TA tools.

Using 1D timeframe lets analyze the mid-term scenario. If we take a look at the last 3 months the price every time found support at the S1 monthly levels. It is the support line which is often respected, thus from time to time I use it in my analysis. I want you to bring your attention that in October the S1 is located at $17300, which is only $200 below that the lowest point of this bear market. The slight lower low is the perfect reversal setup. In this case we will see enough fear to activate the panic sellers and at the same time the liquidity provision to the large players. Moreover the lower low can be the evidence of the bearish wave 5 end which is in conjunction with the MACD divergence will enhance the long signal.

Best regards, Ivan

title: EURAUD- Excellent breakout (Jump to 1.5760 possible)
name: FxWirePro
contents:
EURAUD breaks 61.8% fib retracement and holds above that level. This confirms the pair has formed a temporary bottom around 1.42833, a jump to 1.5760/1.6000 is possible. Minor bearishness only below 1.5380.

It is good to buy on dips around 1.5508-100 with SL around 1.5380 for a TP of 1.5760/1.6000.
Comment: EURAUD Flying. Jump to 1.5760 is possible

title: AUD/USD:SELL From Accumulation Pattern for SHORT Setup
name: FOREXN1
contents: AUD/USD is inside a Bearish channel , in the last session the price is struggling inside a accumulation pattern where, following the main trend ( Downtrend ), the price could explode with a breakout of the local support to continue its rally in the lower side of the chart. As you can see the stochastic is approaching the oversold value and our Target price should be 0.61500 .The Ichimoku forecast is still Bearish and all the clues are in the bearish side favor.
Comment: ✅ PREVIOUS WINNING IDEA ✅
Comment: ✅ TODAY ✅

title: XRP short opportunity
name: CryptoSlazy
contents:
XRP was recently skyrocketing but i believe the price needs to correct, because we are still in the bear market and not bullish . XRP has formed bearish divergence on 2 hours timeframe and double top pattern on daily / 8h timeframe. which indicates the price are going much much lower.

but we still need few confirmations in order to go for short position. we need to break the previous lows and 8 hours 50 period moving avg which XRP was respecting along this rally. once we break and retest the price, we can go short

title: XRP: Rallies will be capped!
name: VantageMarkets
contents:
XRP

Intraday - We look to Sell at 0.5239 (stop at 0.5401)

Bespoke resistance is located at 0.5250. Bearish divergence can be seen on the daily chart (the chart makes a higher high while the oscillator makes a lower high), often a signal of exhausted bullish momentum, or at least a correction lower. Bearish divergence can be seen on the 4 hour chart (the chart makes a higher high while the oscillator makes a lower high), often a signal of exhausted bullish momentum, or at least a correction lower. Bearish divergence is expected to cap gains. We look for a temporary move higher.

Our profit targets will be 0.4851 and 0.4761

Resistance: 0.5000 / 0.5100 / 0.5250
Support: 0.4800 / 0.4650 / 0.4500

Please be advised that the information presented on TradingView is provided to Vantage (‘Vantage Global Limited’, ‘we’) by a third-party provider (‘Signal Centre’). Please be reminded that you are solely responsible for the trading decisions on your account. There is a very high degree of risk involved in trading. Any information and/or content is intended entirely for research, educational and informational purposes only and does not constitute investment or consultation advice or investment strategy. The information is not tailored to the investment needs of any specific person and therefore does not involve a consideration of any of the investment objectives, financial situation or needs of any viewer that may receive it. Kindly also note that past performance is not a reliable indicator of future results. Actual results may differ materially from those anticipated in forward-looking or past performance statements. We assume no liability as to the accuracy or completeness of any of the information and/or content provided herein and the Company cannot be held responsible for any omission, mistake nor for any loss or damage including without limitation to any loss of profit which may arise from reliance on any information supplied by Signal Centre.

title: NQ Update
name: hungry_hippo
contents:
NQ is oversold, but RTY went close to overbought and dropping, ES is neutral. No idea which way this is headed tomorrow.

CPI numbers premarket, place your bets, lol.
Comment: Stocks appear to be coiling just waiting for the news
Comment: Not tech related, but remember that bank earnings start Friday
Comment: My guess is gap down then reversal tomorrow, but it's a guess, nothing more
Comment: I don't think EOD direction means much, the market went up before CPE numbers. Euro direction won't matter either because the market will either pump or dump at 8:30am.

Comment: Oversold on the 3 hr, but not the daily, weekly, or monthly charts. Still lots of room to go down.

One day at a time though

title: ...But ...I was told the markets will crash now
name: stewdamus
contents: Why are regional banks breaking out to new 6 months highs relative to the S&P? Does smart money know something that retailers are missing?
